response.overview: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he is horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a young woman, suffering from PTSD, who knows a secret six digit code number.
response.title: Don't Say a Word

titles.title: サウンド・オブ・サイレンス：2001
